3:
For your covenant faithfulness is before my eyes,
\q and I walk about in your faithfulness.
4:
I do not associate with deceitful people,
\q nor do I mingle with dishonest people.
\q
5:
I hate the assembly of evildoers,
\q and I do not live with the wicked.
6:
I wash my hands in innocence,
\q and I go around your altar, Yahweh,
\q
7:
to sing a loud song of praise
\q and report all your wonderful deeds.
\q
8:
Yahweh, I love the house where you live,
\q the place where your glory lives!
9:
Do not sweep me away with sinners,
\q or my life with people who are bloodthirsty,
\q
10:
in whose hands there is a plot,
\q and whose right hand is full of bribes.
12:
My foot stands on level ground;
\q in the assemblies will I bless Yahweh!
